dict.string: Euphorie uses your camera to scan and analyze your surroundings, journals, documents, and objects using AI to provide contextual insights and enhanced understanding of what you're viewing. For example, point your camera at a journal entry to get deeper analysis or at objects to learn more about them
Euphorie accesses your photo library so you can select existing photos of journals, documents, or scenes to analyze with AI and gain contextual insights from previously captured images
Euphorie saves analyzed images and their AI-generated insights to your photo library so you can reference them later and keep a record of your scanned content
Euphorie uses your microphone to record voice notes and audio annotations when scanning environments or journals, allowing you to add verbal context to your visual AI analysis
